channel.title: Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen" - Adding new content

item.title: Re: Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen
item.content:encoded: Just finished adding all the new content and updating the relevant pages.

item.title: Re: Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen
Dragonlance: Shadow of the Dragon Queen
item.content:encoded:
Gonna start adding new pages for content in the new Dragonlance book.

Lineages:
Kender - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/lineage:kender

Subclasses:
Sorcerer: Lunar Sorcery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/sorcerer:lunar-sorcery

Backgrounds:
Knight of Solamnia - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:knight-of-solamnia
Mage of High Sorcery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:mage-of-high-sorcery

Feats:
Adept of the Black Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-black-robes
Adept of the Red Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-red-robes
Adept of the White Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-white-robes
Divinely Favored - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:divinely-favored
Initiate of High Sorcery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:initiate-of-high-sorcery
Knight of the Crown - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-crown
Knight of the Rose - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-rose
Knight of the Sword - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-sword
Squire of Solamnia - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:squire-of-solamnia

Magic Items:
Dragonlance - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:dragonlance
Flying Citadel Helm - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:flying-citadel-helm
Kagonesti Forest Shroud - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:kagonesti-forest-shroud
Mirror of Reflected Pasts - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:mirror-of-reflected-pasts

Adventuring Gear:
Fargab - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/adventuring-gear
Narycrash - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/adventuring-gear

Weapons:
Hoopak - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/weapons

Siege Equipment:
Boilerdrak - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/siege-equipment:boilerdrak
Gnomeflinger - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/siege-equipment:gnomeflinger
